tool.name: build_portfolio

param.name: in_sortedEOs
param.dialogReference:
Input feature class with scored Element Occurrences.

This is an output generated by the "Score Element Occurrences" tool.

param.name: out_sortedEOs
param.dialogReference: Output feature class with Element Occurrences that have been further ranked and sorted. Inclusion within the conservation portfolio is indicated by the value 1 within the PORTFOLIO field.

param.name: in_sumTab
param.dialogReference:
Input table summarizing the numbers of Element Occurrences per element included in the prioritization process.

This is an output generated by the "Attribute Element Occurrences" tool.

param.name: out_sumTab
param.displayname: Output Updated Element Portfolio Summary Table
param.dialogReference: Output updated table summarizing the numbers of Element Occurrences per element included in the prioritization process.

param.name: out_ConSites
param.dialogReference: Output feature class with ranked and sorted Conservation Sites. Inclusion within the conservation portfolio is indicated by the value 1 within the PORTFOLIO field

param.name: build
param.dialogReference:
Type of portfolio build to perform. The options are:

  • NEW: overwrite any existing portfolio picks for both EOs and ConSites

  • NEW_EO: overwrite existing EO picks, but keep previous ConSite picks

  • NEW_CS: overwrite existing ConSite picks, but keep previous EO picks

  • UPDATE: Update portfolio but keep existing picks for both EOs and ConSites

tool.summary:
Builds a portfolio of EOs and Conservation Sites of highest conservation priority.

This tool requires outputs from the "Attribute Element Occurrences" and "Build Conservation Portfolio" tools as inputs.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Builds a portfolio of EOs and Conservation Sites of highest conservation priority.

This tool requires outputs from the "Attribute Element Occurrences" and "Build Conservation Portfolio" tools as inputs.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Virginia Natural Heritage Program (Kirsten R. Hazler)
